title: cant get into the client.
body: keeps saying i have the wrong password. wtf is going on?????

replies.body: It looks like there's been a couple passwords changes done pretty recently. If this wasn't done by you, I'd strongly suggest reaching out to us through our [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) as soon as possible to make sure your account is secured.
